p:
In MFSelector, the parameters permut, svdetimes, and svdenoise have to be specified in order to define the level of stringency for monotonicity. Following our previous study [ 36], we chose permut = 100, svdetimes = 100, and svdenoise =
0.1
. Finally, we considered, in our further analysis, only the genes as significant MEGs that have a FDR
≤ 0.1
and sample variance for discriminating error value ≤1.
